CC: Nada El Bitar; Hiba Assaf <hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com>; Lali Das <Lali.Das@chalhoub.com>; Yasir Panthakkal <yasir.panthakkal@etoilegroup.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-07-06 14:15
Subject: Insurance Required //  DROP LOG ID 176862-SSEGAE2506637 : BONACINA | ORDER N° 38/2025 READY FOR DELIVERY
--------------------------------------------------
Hi @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 

 

Hope you’re doing well, 

 

We would like to insure the subject Personal shipment for Mr. Patrick Challhoub

Kindly let us know once Insured

 

Terms are EXW.

MOT – AIR

 

*	Packing details: 1 package (composed of two wooden crates joined together) - Dimensions: 199 x 199 x H.64 cm - Weight: 360 kg
*	Packed cargo pictures

 

 

Regards

Geeta Manjal

Dear Yasir,

I hope this email finds you well.

Thank you for sharing the payment reference.

 

You can proceed with the collection of the goods, but please kindly inform us in advance of the date and time of the pickup, so that we can prepare the necessary transport documents.

Let us know which transporter will be in charge of the collection.

 

We remain at your disposal.

 

Best regards,

Graziana
